spiritsExplanation:
The workout video titled '15 min DAILY STRETCH ROUTINE (Full Body Stretch for Flexibility & Mobility)' and its associated metadata highlight a focus on calm, flowing, and restorative stretching exercises. The description emphasizes a 'quick, full body stretch' designed for mobility and flexibility, suggesting a routine that focuses on smooth transitions and fluid movements, characteristic of the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit. The tags also include terms such as '15 min yoga' and 'full body stretch routine,' reinforcing this theme.

Moreover, the video's purpose to be incorporated into daily routines points towards a 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit, which is confirmed by its suitability for morning, bedtime, or post-workout stretching aimed at relaxation and stress reduction. Positive comments highlight the video as calming and easy to follow, countering more intense forms of exercise.

The score of 0.9 for 'Soothing & Restorative' reflects its primary focus on gentle and healing movements, while a score of 0.7 for 'Flow & Rhythm' captures the smooth transitions suggested within the routine. The energy is clearly not intense or sports-focused, leading to the exclusion of other spirits.
